text: The United VC was a professional women's volleyball team in the Philippine Superliga (PSL). Established in 2017, the club debuted under the sponsorship of United Coconut Planters Life Assurance Corporation (COCOLIFE) and played as the COCOLIFE Asset Managers from the 2017 to 2018 seasons.Cocolife taps Padda to handle squad, sports.abs-cbn.com, February 19, 2017Michele Gumabao, Denden Lazaro break down barriers, team up for Cocolife in PSL, spin.ph, February 19, 2017Lazaro, Gumabao to banner newcomer Cocolife in Super Liga, philstar.com, February 19, 2017 The club disbanded in June 2019 due to its inability to find a new sponsor. Prior to the disbandment, key players Alohi Robins-Hardy and Kalei Mau signed up with other PSL teams. ==Name changes== * UVC - Cocolife Asset Managers (2017–2018) * United Volleyball Club (2019) ==Current roster== For the 2019 PSL Grand Prix Conference: {|class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%; text-align:center; width:100%;" |- !style="width:3em; background:#02B0A8; color:white;"|No. !style="width:16em; background:#02B0A8; color:white;"|Name !style="width:3em; background:#02B0A8; color:white;"|Pos. !style="width:8em; background:#02B0A8; color:white;"|Height !style="width:8em; background:#02B0A8; color:white;"|Weight !style="width:8em; background:#02B0A8; color:white;"|Spike !style="width:8em; background:#02B0A8; color:white;"|Block !style="width:12em; background:#02B0A8; color:white;"|Date of birth |- | || align=left| () || OH || || || || || align=right| |- | || align=left| () || OH || |||||||| align=right| |- | || align=left| || S || |||||||| align=right| |- | || align=left| () || OPP || |||||||| align=right| |- | || align=left| () || L || |||||||| align=right| |- | || align=left| || OH || || || || || align=right| |- | || align=left| || OPP || || || || || align=right| |- | || align=left| || OPP || |||||||| align=right| |- | || align=left| || MB || || || || || align=right| |- | || align=left| () || L || |||||||| align=right| |- | || align=left| || MB || || || || || align=right| |- | || align=left| || S || || || || || align=right| |- | || align=left| || MB || || || || || align=right| |- | || align=left| || MB || || || || || align=right| |- | || align=left| || OH || || || || || align=right| |- |} Head Coach * Joshua Ylaya Assistant Coach(es) * Tina Salak Team Manager * Vian Seranilla | valign="top" | Physical Therapist * B.
